text: HTrrfmu <cfv <THTi wfeqrrut Tq Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (1em 4a67t 3r Tozati #ATGT4) (Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 TT MT Nt 7 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 01-5 U 6, 9qz7-10, ETHT _ #fah - 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn 30ih April, 2012 PQLCY MATTERS-TECHNICAL (99/2012) [Decision _taken on File NoNHAIRRSC[2010Fundl Sub: Funding of  Safety Audit for PPP Projects on DBFO Basis and Operation & Maintenance of Highways-Reg: In compliance to the decision taken in the Executive Committee in its 1OOlh meeting dated 31.03.2012 regarding payment to safety consultant deployed/appointed for safety audit on PPP projects, it is hereby informed that the circular No. NHAI/RSC/2OIO/ASC/Tender-IIl/Fund/1299 dated 11.7.2011 (Annexure-I) has been withdrawn with immediate effect. Payment to the safety consultants shall be made as per circular No; NHAI/RSC/2O1O/ASC/Tender-Il/707 dated 06.01.201 (Annexure-II): 2 This issues with approval of the Chairman. Joh (V.K.
